item.title: Building giant and ambitious games | Brendan Greene interview
item.description: Elvis Presley once said, "Ambition is a dream with a V8 engine." Brendan Greene, the creator of PUBG, still has a lot of ambition.

item.title: ChatGPT adds more PC and Mac app integrations, getting closer to piloting your computer
item.description: ChatGPT can now support more coding platforms and applications on its desktop apps, opening the door for more agentic use in the future.

item.title: Google unveils new reasoning model Gemini 2.0 Flash Thinking to rival OpenAI o1
item.description: Unlike competitor reasoning model o1 from OpenAI, Gemini 2.0 enables users to access its step-by-step reasoning through a dropdown menu.

item.title: Stable Diffusion 3.5 hits Amazon Bedrock: What it means for enterprise AI workflows
item.description: Stability AI CEO drives enterprise AI focus home as the flagship Stable Diffusion models land on Amazon Bedrock.

item.title: Small model, big impact: Patronus AIâ€™s Glider outperforms GPT-4 in key AI evaluation tasks
item.description: Patronus AI launches Glider, a breakthrough 3.8B-parameter language model that rivals GPT-4's evaluation capabilities while running on-device, offerin...
